item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 07 Feb 2023
item.description:
1. Tezt 3.0.0, now JS-compatible and in its own repository
  2. Shuttle 0.9.1 released
  3. Outreachy Summer 2023
  4. Usability improvements in the OCaml compiler codebase
  5. Learning to write PPX extenders: some links
  6. Stramon 0.3.0 - Process behavior monitoring utility based on strace
